name: planted.pulled
description: Fresh herbs, chili, and smoky chipotle create a spicy, flavorful pulled experience.
longDescription: Our planted.pulled Spicy Herbs brings the heat with fresh herbs, a touch of chili, and smoky chipotle. Made sustainably from sunflower protein and peas, it's packed with protein and bursting with flavor. Ideal for spicing up your tacos, burgers, or simply served over rice for a quick, satisfying meal.
ingredients: Water, sunflower protein (20%), pea protein, rapeseed oil, herbs, chili (2%), chipotle, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Heat in a pan for 3-4 minutes. Great for tacos, burritos, or served over rice with fresh toppings.

steps.title: Heat
steps.description: Pan on medium. Already seasoned with herbs and spice.
